website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for offering everything you need in a vanity – spaciousness, versatility, durability, and style.
pros: A 60-inch model with ample storage space
Its solid oak construction, crisp white finish, and stainless steel hardware fit almost any decor
cons: Not for small bathrooms, and it's expensive – but it has a lot to offer on almost every front

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love our new vanity. The shipping was fast and it came well protected. The vanity does come without faucets, which we expected. It also comes in one solid piece with the top attached. The back has openings for plumbing, which makes it very convenient. It comes with the knobs and pulls and the drawers and doors are soft close. Great product and service, I would definitely recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this vanity! Very elegant, modern, extremely sturdy. Live the soft close drawers and the overall tall height. Replacing our old vanity with this beautiful one has totally changed our bathroom. It also came very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: rockinmom79

customer_reviews.title: Real nice vanity for the money and the delivery went off ...
customer_reviews.text: Received as described. Real nice vanity for the money and the delivery went off without a hitch. Definitley would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jazemma3

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful vanity, but one of the sinks collapsed.
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful vanity, but one of the sinks collapsed. The handles are not stainless steel, and the product I received was not made from Stufurhome. It was a different company. One of the cast iron sinks collapsed from the marble. The sinks are not set in place properly. There were only 2 brackets for each sink and no epoxy. Verify that your product is coming from the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Moni H

customer_reviews.title: this is one of the best priced items out there
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best priced items out there. Nothing else comes close for more than $400. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because the countertop on outside of rh side bowl was cracked. I had read other reviews complaining about arriving cracked, but for the price, deliver logistical nightmare and size of crack and visibility, I am not sweating it. Just downgrading my review by one star.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Granados

customer_reviews.title: Great vanity. Sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: Great vanity. Sturdy and well built. It comes assembled. The drawers are soft close and easily come out and are re-inserted effortlessly. Sinks have an overflow hole. Lots of storage and looks great. My only complaint is it came missing one drawer pull handle, but had the rest of them. But other than that I am completely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but terrible delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Nice vanity an nice piece of furniture. Warning to installer: very heavy! I would have given this 5 stars but the delivery was a disaster. The delivery company used by Amazon screwed it up twice. The delivery required a signature and we wasted 2 days at home waiting for a delivery that was never made. Finally it came the third time and we are happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vanity for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice, but does not include the splash guard on the back of the vanity. It is very well made and very sturdy and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder W

customer_reviews.title: I love the soft closures of the drawers and cabinets.great bathroom update!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, for a great price, good quality. I love the soft closures of the drawers and cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: KatieMathson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and just opened it. Unfortunately the marble top is completely cracked :( The product itself is nice. Sad to have to wait for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific vanity for the price
customer_reviews.text: Vanity arrived doubled boxed with an additional foam liner. The vanity is both sturdy and beautiful while completing our nickel finishes. We had to wait until our contractors were ready to do the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Our contractor asked us where we ordered the vanity from and kept remarking what a great quality it was. It doesn't come with a backsplash but that's what we wanted since we were going with an accent wall. The marble is solid but as other reviewers noted it may need to be sealed. Doors are all soft closing. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: StephStovall

product_meta.title: Stufurhome GM-6412-60PW-CR 60-Inch Malibu Pure White Double Sink Bathroom Vanity
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteAn ideal complement to a contemporary decor, the 60" malibu double sink vanity embodies the clean edges and sophistication of modern design. The pure white cabinet, made of solid oak lends a cozy feeling to your bathroom that matches beautifully with the Carrera white marble top. Sleek and simple stainless steel hardware dresses up the European soft-closing sliders and doors, which give you ample space to store your bathroom items.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
An ideal complement to a contemporary decor, the 60" Malibu Double Sink Vanity embodies the clean edges and sophistication of modern design. The pure white cabinet, made of solid oak lends a cozy feeling to your bathroom that matches beautifully with the Carrara White Marble top. Sleek and simple stainless steel hardware dresses up the European soft-closing sliders and doors, which give you ample space to store your bathroom items.
feature_bullets: Three (3) pre-drilled faucet holes on each side
Three (3) pre-drilled faucet holes on each side
